data.eml:eml: Report on the turrid genera Gemmula, Lophiotoma and Ptychosyrinx (Gastropoda: Turridae: Turrinae) from the China seas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Baoquan, Li, Xinzheng (2008): Report on the turrid genera Gemmula, Lophiotoma and Ptychosyrinx (Gastropoda: Turridae: Turrinae) from the China seas. Zootaxa 1778: 1-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274298
